meanings.definition: Colugos: A type of gliding mammal found in Southeast Asia.
meanings.sent1: Colugos are fascinating creatures that can glide through the air.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of colugos hanging from the trees in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The colugos in the zoo were showing off their gliding skills to the visitors.
meanings.sent4: Watching the colugos glide effortlessly reminded me of paper airplanes in flight.
meanings.sent5: The sight of colugos soaring between trees is a memorable experience.

meanings.sent1: We learned about colugos in science class today.
meanings.sent2: The researchers studied the behavior of colugos in the wild.
meanings.sent3: The colugos at the sanctuary were having a party to celebrate their uniqueness.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, the colugos seemed to form a secret society of gliders.
meanings.sent5: The children were excited to see the colugos up close at the nature reserve.
